original_text: So I spake unto the people in the morning: and at even my wife died; and I did in the morning as I was commanded.
korean_text: 내가 아침에 백성에게 말하였더니 저녁에 내 아내가 죽었으므로 아침에 내가 받은 명령대로 행하매

sentences.original_text: So I spake unto the people in the morning
and at even my wife died
and I did in the morning as I was commanded
